title: Shared Reality - incentive token
description: Disinformation is a grave threat. The public is losing this information war. We need to incentivize the creation of better information.
solution: A token-based rewards system for contributions for the Shared Reality platform, to support the frictionless flow of information.
experience: I am a web developer, developed the https://SharedReality.solutions platform, and understand the defects in our information ecosystem.
